**The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture on Extinguishing Karma and Refining the Corpse to Restore Life**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture on Extinguishing Karma and Refining the Corpse to Restore Life*. Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. One of the ancient *Scriptures of Numinous Treasure*. Originally in one scroll, now rearranged into two. The base text of the upper scroll derives from the *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Unity* (Washing Mystery Section, Original Texts Category); collated with Dunhuang manuscript P.2865 (first half). The base text of the lower scroll is Dunhuang manuscript P.2865 (second half); collated with Dunhuang manuscript S.298.

**The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture on Extinguishing Karma and Refining the Corpse to Restore Life, Scroll One**

At that time, the Heavenly Worthy was in the Fragrant Grove Garden of the Ever-Joyful Abode, instructing seven thousand two hundred and forty youths. When the Dharma rites were roughly complete, the youths of superior wisdom and the Wheel-Turning Celestial Youths advanced, made obeisance, and addressed the Heavenly Worthy: "Today, as we attend your seat, our joy is beyond measure. The heavens have opened their grace, and all is radiant with light. The dark prisons of hell, the frozen realms of eternal night, the three paths and five sufferings of hungry ghosts and deceased spirits—all have been liberated and restored to blessedness. The Three Offices have ceased their accusations, and the living and the dead rejoice together.

Yet the souls of the departed, though freed, have not yet entered the Wheel of Rebirth. Their corporeal spirits scatter and fall, their rotting bones devoid of moisture, sinking into the ninefold earth, strewn across the subterranean bureaus. Their wandering souls drift in anguish, unable to return. The Earthly Offices press for reckoning, their bodily forms restless, enduring renewed sorrow and oppression, gazing upward to implore the heavens.

Now that grace has been extended and all is made anew, the August Dao flows freely, its blessings reaching the ten directions. We have heard that the Heavenly Worthy has bestowed great compassion; we pray that the August Mercy be universally applied. Grant that those who should be delivered be delivered, those who should be born be born, those who should be transformed be transformed, and those who should return be returned. If their karmic bonds are not yet severed and they cannot return, their bodily forms remain in their former abodes, concealed in the nine springs. Harassed by myriad spirits, they find no refuge, their wandering souls adrift, returning to afflict their descendants.

Since the Great Transformation has arisen, it is fitting that all be universally absolved. We do not know if there are further essential methods within the Dharma that may be proclaimed, to be announced to the Earthly Offices, so that they may pacify, console, and shelter them, allowing all to find peace. Let the nine bureaus be duly distinguished, and their bodies guarded and tended. If you deign to show compassion, then all under heaven will rejoice in harmony, the living and the dead bearing no resentment, and blessings will flow for a hundred million kalpas, endless through the ages."

Thereupon, the Heavenly Worthy universally commanded the Heavenly Thearchs, the Limitless Supreme Great Dao Lords, the Great Sage Assemblies of the Ten Directions, the Perfected Lords and Venerable Ones, the Flying Celestial Divine Kings, the Five Elder Thearchs, the Southern Supreme Life-Nurturing and World-Delivering Sima, the Recorders of Deeds and Lords of Destiny, the Perfected Ones of Longevity, the Jade Maidens of Mystic Harmony, the various Perfected Ones, and the innumerable hosts—all to resume their seats. "Now I shall further expound the Dharma gates for the youths of superior wisdom, clarifying the ancient canons of the Dragon Han and Mystic Capital, the *Jade Casket of the Nine Dark Realms* and the *Scripture of the Maiden of Azure Jade*, to deliver the dark prisons of hell, the frozen realms of eternal night, the three paths and five sufferings of hungry ghosts and deceased spirits, that all may behold the light.

Proclaim to the heavens, that each may elucidate the spontaneous jade scripts of their celestial names. Universally announce to the celestial and terrestrial water bureaus, the sun, moon, and stellar lodges, the Jade Armillary and Jade Balance, the Three Realms and Five Thearchs, the sacred mountains of the Five Peaks, the earthly officials of the nine lands, the Caverns of Primordial, Abyssal, Void, Numinous, and Non-Being, the Limitless and Boundless, the measureless heights and depths, the formless and colorless, the soundless and silent, the immeasurably vast and minute—all spirits and numina, each according to their appointed tasks.

Now, for those under your jurisdiction—those souls condemned for past transgressions—record their good and evil deeds, merits and faults, years, months, and days. Itemize each matter, distinguish their former abodes and the whereabouts of their bodily forms, and according to their respective domains, console and shelter them. Let the earthly deities guard and protect them, tend and provide for them, allowing no disturbance, so that they may achieve fruition according to their merits. Let those who should be transferred be transferred, those who should be delivered be delivered, those who should be transformed be transformed, and those who should be born be born. Let the records of the fallen be reviewed, the vows of the waters absolved, the celestial decrees of punishment erased, and all be made manifest."

Thereupon, the assembly of the fourfold host and the youths of superior wisdom rejoiced, made obeisance, and simultaneously raised their hands, snapping their fingers in praise.

At that moment, the Thirty-Two Heavenly Thearchs took their seats and commanded the Flying Celestial Divine Beings to unfurl the Purple Yang Jade Terrace, open the Luminous True Jade Casket, and retrieve the celestial, spontaneously arisen jade scriptures of the *Infinite Cavern Chapters* from the Heavenly Center. These were entrusted to the Earthly Offices to deliver all beings, pacify the corpse, guard the numen, and preserve the soul and spirit.

The Great Yellow August Heaven of Zeng, the Great Bright Jade Perfect Heaven, the Clear Bright How-Youth Heaven, the Mystic Womb Nurturing Heaven, the Primordial Bright Literary Flourishing Heaven, the Seven Luminaries Majestic Heaven, the Void Transcendent Balance Heaven, and the Supreme Ultimate Veiled Heaven—these eight heavens together possess eight characters, totaling sixty-four, which are assigned to the Nine Qi Heavenly Lords of the East. By the Azure Thearch’s *Great Mystery Maiden of Azure Jade Talisman*, they are proclaimed to the nine bureaus of the Eastern Earthly Offices, to deliver all deceased souls, pacify and guard their bodily forms, tend and console them, allowing no harassment or disturbance by the Earthly Offices, all in accordance with the *Maiden of Azure Jade Scripture* and the *Golden Dragon Courier’s Edicts*.

The Bright Crimson Harmonious Yang Heaven, the Mystic Bright Reverent Flourishing Heaven, the Radiant Bright Ancestral Whirling Heaven, the Bamboo Grove August Reed Heaven, the Void Bright Hall Radiance Heaven, the Contemplative Bright Upright Tranquility Heaven, the Mystic Bright Reverent Celebration Heaven, and the Supreme Resplendent Ultimate Jade Heaven—these eight heavens together possess eight characters, totaling sixty-four, which are assigned to the Three Qi Heavenly Lords of the South. By the Crimson Thearch’s *Great Mystery Maiden of Azure Jade Talisman*, they are proclaimed to the nine bureaus of the Southern Earthly Offices, to deliver all deceased souls of the South, pacify and guard their bodily forms, tend and console them, allowing no harassment or disturbance by the Earthly Offices, all in accordance with the *Maiden of Azure Jade Scripture* and the *Golden Dragon Courier’s Edicts*.

The Primordial Loaded Perforated Ascent Heaven, the Supreme Peace August Cliff Heaven, the Manifestly Fixed Ultimate Wind Heaven, the Beginning August Filial Awn Heaven, the Supreme Yellow Venerable Heavy Heaven, the No-Thought River Origin Heaven, the Upper Dice Joyous Heaven, and the Limitless Cloud Vow Heaven—these eight heavens...

The heavens possess eight characters, combining into sixty-four, which are assigned to the Seven Qi Heavenly Lords of the West. By the White Thearch’s *Great Mystery Maiden of Azure Jade Talisman*, they are proclaimed to the nine bureaus of the Western Earthly Offices, to deliver all deceased souls of the West, pacify and guard their bodily forms, tend and console them, allowing no harassment or disturbance by the Earthly Offices, all in accordance with the *Maiden of Azure Jade Scripture* and the *Golden Dragon Courier’s Edicts*.

The Radiant Court Rosy Ascent Heaven, the Abyssal Permeation Primordial Grotto Heaven, the Soaring Honor Wondrous Completion Heaven, the Elegant Joy Forbidden Upper Heaven, the Peerless Constant Fusion Heaven, the Jade Exaltation Ascendant Victory Heaven, the Dragon Transformation Brahmanic Deliverance Heaven, and the Level Nurturing Splendid Brilliance Heaven—these eight heavens possess eight characters, combining into sixty-four, which are assigned to the Five Qi Heavenly Lords of the North. By the Black Thearch’s *Great Mystery Maiden of Azure Jade Talisman*, they are proclaimed to the nine bureaus of the Northern Earthly Offices, to deliver all deceased souls of the North, pacify and guard their bodily forms, tend and console them, allowing no harassment or disturbance by the Earthly Offices, all in accordance with the *Maiden of Azure Jade Scripture* and the *Golden Dragon Courier’s Edicts*.

The Supreme Supreme Supreme One Qi One Qi, the Supreme Supreme Supreme Limitless Peakless Colorless, the Heaven of the Great Net’s Natural Jade Script, governs the Central Yellow Primordial Heavenly Lord. By the Yellow Thearch’s *Great Mystery Maiden of Azure Jade Talisman*, they are proclaimed to the nine bureaus of the Central Earthly Offices, to deliver all deceased souls of the Center, pacify and guard their bodily forms, tend and console them, allowing no harassment or disturbance by the Earthly Offices, all in accordance with the *Maiden of Azure Jade Scripture* and the *Golden Dragon Courier’s Transmissions*.

Each heaven dispatches its Flying Heavenly Divine Kings, who, with the *Heavenly Center’s Numinous Sound Natural Jade Script Maiden of Azure Jade Talisman*, jointly proclaim to the Earthly Offices of the Five Directions, Five Thearchs, and Five Marchmounts. They each comply with the talismanic commands, reverently upholding the Great Dao.

The August Dao now made manifest, the heavens cleared and the qi settled; the Three Luminaries halted their wheels, the stellar lodges shone resplendently, the celestial pivots ceased their motion, rivers and seas stilled in silence, mountains and peaks swallowed their mists. The seasons harmonized, the qi purified, golden winds brushed away the dust, the heavens held no drifting veils, sun and moon bathed in radiance. The Five Sufferings dissolved, the long night’s souls awakened, withered trees blossomed anew, the dead regained their forms, unicorns danced and phoenixes soared, their joyful cries filling the air. The heavens leapt in exultation, scattering flowers and chanting praises.

The Heavenly Worthy, filled with delight, intoned this hymn:

The Crimson Clarity returns to transformation,
Merging with you yet dividing.
Yin and yang refine and change,
Their Dao naturally so.
The Mysterious Chart turns sevenfold,
To nine it still returns.
The Primordial Mandate’s numinous script,
Boundless are its cavernous chapters.
The ranks of the impermanent,
Their qi unites the Nine Mornings.
Yang’s light stealthily stirs,
Bright effulgences ride the mist.
Three revolutions, five refinements,
Harmonized with the Seven Streams.
Following their hues, they flourish and shine,
Each returning to their original spirits.
The Great Dao simplifies deliverance,
Withered bones regain their forms.
Treasure my wondrous Dao,
Ascend to the rank of Upper Perfected.
Return to the Five Refinements,
The supreme Dao’s highest numen.
Illuminating sun and moon,
Pervading the Nine Clarities.
The heavens open their grace,
The dark night’s mystery clears.
Withered bones transcend their steps,
Refined transformations arise of themselves.
Inhaling and exhaling the numinous harmony,
Piercing the dark to enter the hidden.
Spirits wondrously transform ten thousandfold,
Flying souls return to their forms.
Riding the mist and mounting the void,
They ascend to the August Court.
The Jade Script proclaims the mandate,
The Earthly Offices attain great peace.
All who receive deliverance
Universally enter the light.
Possessing my precious script,
Generation after generation, they transform and live.
Careless leaks and wanton disclosures
Will meet the wind’s blade in punishment.
The Jade Chapters’ numinous script births vermilion light,
The Five Numinous coalesce their essence, illuminating the ten directions.
The four eights divide their positions, uniting the Five Phases,
The stellar lodges, sun, moon, yin, and yang flow in communion.
Establishing the Heavenly Perfected to protect the Supreme August,
Opening the Dharma-gate to unify all.
The Great Thousand of the Maitreya Dao flourishes,
The golden throne’s joy cannot be constant.
The heavens leap in exultation, offering numinous hymns,
Opening my wondrous Dao to enlighten the young.
May you, through kalpas without end, live without limit,
Ninefold refined into Perfected, enthroned as Immortal Kings.
Guard this within your breast, take care not to divulge it.

The Heavenly Worthy finished his hymn. The Heavenly Thearchs, the Limitless Supreme Great Dao Lords, the Ten Directions’ Limitless Perfected Great Sages, the Flying Heavenly Divine Kings, the Five Venerable Thearch Lords, the Southern Supreme Life-Nurturing and World-Delivering Sima, the Recorders and Life-Mandate Officers, the Upper Numinous Immortals, the Mysterious Harmony Jade Maidens, the various Primordial Lords and Numinous Consorts, the Perfected Ones, and the innumerable hosts—seven thousand two hundred and forty youths—all rose as one. Pinching incense and scattering flowers, they circumambulated thrice to the left, then turned northward to bow, raising their hands and snapping their fingers.

The thirty-two heavens’ sun, moon, and stellar lodges all shone brightly at once. The Nine Dark Abysses of the netherworld’s limitless caverns were pervaded by luminous mystery, no longer shrouded in darkness, their hidden depths universally revealed. The Earth Treasury released its stores, gold and jade revealed their forms, mountains and rivers, streams and ravines, all leveled in vast evenness. White bones received qi, withered corpses regained their souls, the Nine Lands attained purity and peace, the Earthly Offices found tranquility, all beings received universal deliverance, none left unenlightened.

The Great Dao flowed and transformed, the August Way unfolded. Universally proclaimed to the heavens’ sun, moon, and stellar lodges, the celestial pivots and jade balances, the Southern and Northern Dippers, the Life-Mandate and Record Officers, Han Jun the Master Recorder, the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace, all earthly and aquatic realms, the Five Marchmounts’ numinous mountains, the Three Offices and Nine Bureaus, the Twelve River Sources, the Long Night’s Bureau within the Nine Darks, the Four Controllers and Five Thearchs—all numinous beings, each obeying the Great Dao, universally rejoiced as one, taking this day as new. Without above or below, without limit or end, without depth or distance, without darkness or concealment, without bounds or edges, without great or small, without beginning or end—all spirits, with a snap of their fingers, received the mandate and complied, reverently following.

The Numinous Treasure Azure Thearch Refines and Delivers the Five Immortals, Pacifies the Numinous and Mirrors the Divine Nine Qi Heavenly Script

The Nine Qi Azure Heaven of the East receives the Primordial Beginning’s talismanic command, proclaimed to the Earthly Offices and divine realms of the Eastern Limitless World. Now, the Supreme Clarity’s faithful disciple So-and-So, having extinguished the Five Immortals, entrusts their corpse to the Great Yin. Today, within such-and-such a realm, a palace hall is established, sheltering their form beneath the earth, clearly upholding the Orthodox Dao, offering solace and consolation. The Azure Numinous nourishes with sweet dew, the Nine Qi present their morning blossoms, their essence and light brimming over, refining and adorning their bodily forms. Their bones become fragrant, their flesh perfumed, enduring kalpas without decay.

The Eastern Marchmount Mount Tai illuminates and opens the Nine Dark Halls of the Long Night, summoning forth the soul-spirit of So-and-So, who is bathed, robed, and crowned, then transferred to the Southern Palace, where clothing and sustenance are provided. Abiding ever in radiance, demons dare not intrude; all numinous spirits attend and guard in peace, precisely as decreed in the ancient *Nüqing* scriptures of the Primordial Beginning’s covenant with the perfected. This text is inscribed in black upon green stone, and the master, having prostrated and presented the yellow silk memorial, buries it in the easternmost boundary of the tomb where the deceased’s bodily form lies. At the moment of burial, the master performs the Nine-Step Yu Pace, advancing to the site, faces east, and recites the large characters and the text in full. He then strikes his teeth twenty-four times, swallows qi nine times, and intones the incantation:

By the talismanic command of the Primordial Beginning, a universal proclamation is issued to the Earthly Offices and divine realms of the Eastern Limitless World, to the Nine Qi General Controller of the Cavernous Void, the Cavernous Non-Being, the Cavernous Profound, and the Cavernous Primordial, and to all netherworld spirits and boundless divine kings of the Three Realms. Today is a day of great celebration: the Azure Heaven’s first yang arises, the exalted chariot assumes its rightful place, and the myriad Dao open forth. So-and-So receives deliverance, entrusts their corpse to the Mysterious Chamber, and as a faithful disciple of the Supreme Clarity, their soul ascends in response. The Five Immortals bathe, their garments are brushed and adorned, their form sheltered in the numinous prison, the earth itself parting to make way. Jade maidens are invoked to pacify and guard the divine palace; all attendants and guardians provide sustenance naturally. When the soul returns to the body, the Celestial Thearch will welcome it—all shall proceed as in the ancient statutes of the Illuminated Perfected.

Upon completion, the text is buried in the earth.

By the talismanic command of the Primordial Beginning, a universal proclamation is issued to the Earthly Offices and divine officials of the Southern Vermilion Limitless World, to the Three Qi General Controller of the Cavernous Void, the Cavernous Non-Being, the Cavernous Profound, and the Natural, and to all netherworld spirits and divine kings of the Three Realms who universally oversee the covenant. Today is an auspicious day: the Great Yang announces the cinnabar, So-and-So returns to the Mysterious, entrusts their corpse to the Nine Mysteries, their rank equal to the Flying Celestials, and receives the revolving wheel of emptiness. Their soul ascends to the Vermilion Mound, where the Five Immortals are refined and delivered. Though their merit has not yet penetrated the true, their form is sheltered by the earthly officials, the four boundaries are opened wide, and the divine palace is pacified and guarded. Wherever they reside, protection and sustenance are provided, and they are escorted forth and welcomed, with no disturbance or intrusion into the divine realms. All proceeds as decreed by the Illuminated Perfected—let all hear and obey.

Today is a day of great celebration: the myriad spirits attend in state, So-and-So receives deliverance, entrusts their corpse to the Nine Mysteries, their soul ascends while their po guards the form, sheltered by the earthly officials. The Four Extremities proclaim the command, illuminating and opening wide, offering solace and consolation, providing sustenance and escort, with no disturbance or intrusion into the divine realms. All proceeds as brightly as the Great Perfected—let all hear and obey.

The White Numinous and Mirrors the Divine Seven Qi Heavenly Script

The Seven Qi White Heaven of the West receives the Primordial Beginning’s talismanic command, proclaimed to the Earthly Offices and divine realms of the Western Limitless World. Now, the Supreme Clarity’s faithful disciple So-and-So, having extinguished the Five Immortals, entrusts their corpse to the Great Yin. Today, within such-and-such a realm, a palace hall is established, sheltering their form beneath the earth, clearly upholding the Orthodox Dao, offering solace and consolation. The White Numinous nourishes with sweet dew, the Seven Qi present their pristine blossoms, their essence and light brimming over, refining and adorning their bodily forms. Their bones become fragrant, their flesh perfumed, enduring kalpas without decay.

The Western Marchmount Mount Hua illuminates and opens the Nine Dark Halls of the Long Night, summoning forth the soul-spirit of So-and-So, who is bathed, robed, and crowned, then transferred to the Celestial Palace, where clothing and sustenance are provided. Abiding ever in radiance, demons dare not intrude; all numinous spirits attend and guard in peace, precisely as decreed in the ancient *Nüqing* scriptures of the Primordial Beginning’s Illuminated Perfected.

Upon inscribing this text on white stone, the master bows and completes the yellow silk memorial. The text is buried at the western extremity of the burial ground where the deceased’s bodily form resides. At the moment of burial, the master declares, performing the Yu Step seven times, proceeding to the designated spot facing west, whereupon the large characters and the text are recited in full. The master then strikes the teeth twenty-four times and holds the breath seven cycles.

The incantation reads:
*"Primordial Beginning’s talismanic decree, universally proclaimed to the Western Numinous Limitless Realm’s Earthly Mansion deities, the Cavernous Void’s Cavernous Non-Being’s Cavernous Mysterious Cavernous Pure Seven Qi General Directorate, the Three Realms’ Divine Courts of the Western Quarter, all myriad qi’s nether numinous limitless divine kings who oversee the verification of truth and deliverance of beings: Today, the Five Harmonies converge; the Lesser Yin announces the covenant. Jia and Yi receive deliverance; the Five Immortals refine their forms. Their corpses are entrusted to the Dark Chamber, temporarily passing through the Central Chamber. The Orthodox Dao’s faithful, attested by the host of Perfected, the Earthly Quarter’s radiance unfolds. Myriad spirits labor; the corpse is at peace, the po soul settled, enduring kalpas in eternal tranquility. Upon attaining the Dao and departing this world, they ascend in a numinous chariot, in perfect accord with the Illuminated Perfected, as of old—swiftly presented."*

The text is then buried in the earth.

**Numinous Treasure’s Black Thearch’s Refinement and Deliverance of the Five Immortals, Pacification of the Spirit, and Stabilization of the Divine Five Qi Celestial Text**

The Northern Five Qi’s Mysterious Heaven receives the Primordial Beginning’s talismanic decree, proclaimed to the Northern Limitless Realm’s Earthly Mansion deities and all numinous officials of the divine precincts: There is now an Orthodox Dao faithful disciple So-and-So, who has extinguished the Five Immortals and entrusted their corpse to the Great Yin. Presently, within such-and-such a realm, a palace is established and a chamber founded, sheltering their form beneath the earth, clearly upholding the Orthodox Dao, offering solace and consolation. The Mysterious Numinous nourishes with jade-like sustenance; the Five Qi present their pristine essence. Their radiance brims over, refining and adorning their bodily forms. Their bones become fragrant, their flesh perfumed, enduring kalpas without decay. The Northern Marchmount Mount Heng illuminates and opens the Nine Dark Halls of the Long Night, summoning forth the soul-spirit of So-and-So, who is bathed, robed, and crowned, then transferred to the Celestial Palace, where clothing and sustenance are provided. Abiding ever in radiance, demons dare not intrude; all numinous spirits attend and guard in peace, precisely as decreed in the ancient *Nüqing* scriptures of the Primordial Beginning’s Illuminated Perfected.

This text is inscribed on black stone, and the master bows and completes the yellow silk memorial. The text is buried at the northern extremity of the burial ground where the deceased’s bodily form resides. At the moment of burial, the master declares, performing the Yu Step five times, proceeding to the designated spot facing north, whereupon the large characters and the text are recited in full. The master then strikes the teeth twenty-four times and holds the breath five cycles.

The incantation reads:

The Primordial Beginning’s talismanic decree is universally proclaimed to the August Lord of the Earthly Bureau of the Northern Primordial Boundless Realm, the Five Qi General Controller of the Cavernous Void, Cavernous Non-Being, Cavernous Mystery, and Cavernous Abyss, and the Most Exalted of the Three Realms, the Divine Lord of the Northern Quarter’s Nethermost and Boundless Numinosity. At this auspicious and harmonious moment, when the Dark Heavens first parted, the Supreme Sages descend in celebration, the Northern Thearch unfurls his clouds, and the cyclical signs *jia* and *yi* receive deliverance. The deceased’s soul, entrusted to the Gate of Darkness, becomes a Perfected of the Supreme Clarity, their rank equal to the Ten Heavens. The Five Earths conceal their form, the Three Officials raise their hun-souls, the Southern Palace bathes them, and the decayed bones are suffused with life’s fragrance. Sheltered in the numinous mound, they endure for a billion kalpas, the true Dao resplendent and unobstructed. The Jade Texts are securely enshrined, all spirits attend in service, and sustenance arises spontaneously. The Great Dharma of Illuminated Perfection is proclaimed for all to hear.

Upon completion, the text is buried in the earth.

The Flying Celestial of the East declares: Open and deliver the Nine Nether Hells, the Three Paths, and the Five Sufferings of the Eastern Quarter, returning them to the Hall of Blessings. Secure the deceased’s bodily form in their former dwelling, that they may abide in peace. The Earthly Bureau’s guards shall attend, providing escort and sustenance. In accordance with the ancient statutes of the *Illuminated Perfection Jade Casket* and the *Nüqing* scriptures of the Upper Palace, take ninety *chi* of azure-patterned silk—or nine *chi*—and present it to the Celestial Lord of the Nine Qi. Request the Jade Texts and talismanic decrees of the *Nüqing* from the heavens, and proclaim them to the spirit officials of the Eastern Quarter. Deliver the hungry ghosts and dead souls from the Nine Nether Hells, the Three Paths, and the Five Sufferings of the East, opening the way to radiance. Secure the deceased’s bodily form in their dwelling, that they may abide in enduring peace, unshaken, as decreed in the *Nüqing* scriptures.

The Flying Celestial of the South declares: Open and deliver the Nine Nether Hells, the Three Paths, and the Five Sufferings of the Southern Quarter, returning them to the Hall of Blessings. Secure the deceased’s bodily form in their former dwelling, that they may abide in peace. The Earthly Bureau’s guards shall attend, providing escort and sustenance. In accordance with the ancient statutes of the *Illuminated Perfection Jade Casket* and the *Nüqing* scriptures of the Upper Palace, take thirty *chi* of crimson-patterned silk and present it to the Celestial Lord of the Three Qi. Request the Jade Texts and talismanic decrees of the *Nüqing* from the heavens, and proclaim them to the spirit officials of the Southern Quarter. chunks.original_text: 太上洞玄灵宝灭度五炼生尸妙经 经名：太上洞玄灵宝灭度五炼生尸妙经。 撰人不详，约出於东晋。 系古《灵宝经》 之一。 原本一卷。 今改作二卷。 上卷底本出处：《正统道藏》洞玄部本文类； 参校：敦煌P.2865号抄本（前半部分）。 下卷底本：敦煌P.2865号写本（后半部分）； 参校：敦煌 S.298号抄本。 太上洞玄灵宝灭度五炼生尸妙经卷上 天尊时於长乐舍香林园中，教化七千二百四十童子。 法事粗悉，上智童子、轮天童子等前进作礼，上白天尊：今日侍座，欢乐难胜。 诸天开宥，一切光明，幽牢地狱积夜寒乡，三涂五苦饿鬼死魂，并得开度，还在福中。 三官息对，生死并欢。 而幽魂始开，未入转轮，尸神奔落，腐骸无津，沈沦九土，纵横地官，飞爽傍徨，不能得还。 土府促会，形尸无宁，更受愁迫，仰诉诸天。 今既开宥，一切普新，皇道既畅，泽被十方。 伏闻天尊既垂大慈，愿普皇恩。 赐应度者度，应生者生，应转者转，应还者还。 如宿缘未绝，不得还者，形尸故宅，幽在九泉，为众灵所迫，不相容受，飞魂无泊，还逮子孙。 大化既兴，宜使普蠲。 不审法中，复有何要，可得申宣，下告地官，安镇抚恤，咸使得安，九署右别，营卫其身。 如蒙哀怜，则普天欢泰，生死无怨，福流亿劫，世世无穷。 於是天尊普命诸天上帝、无极大上大道君、十方大圣众、至真诸君丈人、飞天神王、五老帝君、南上好生度世司马、司录司命、长生上圣、玄和玉女、诸真人、无鞅数众，一时复坐。 今当更为上智童子开诸法门，申明龙汉玄都旧典，九幽玉匮女青玉文，拔度幽牢地狱，积夜寒乡，三涂五苦饿鬼死魂，令悉见光明。 宣告诸天，各明玉字自然玄文，普告诸天诸地水府、日月星宿、璇玑玉衡，三界五帝、五岳灵山、九土灵官，洞元洞渊洞空洞灵洞无，无极无穷、无高无下、无形无色、无音无响、无大无小，一切神灵，明各任别。 今所统领宿谪罪魂，善恶功过，年岁日月。 事事列言，分别故宅形骸所在，随其部界，悉为安恤，地祇卫护，经营供给，无令摇动，随功成就。 使应迁者迁，应度者度，应转者转，应生者生。 落地简对，绝水盟言，除天文墨，一切见明。 於是四众上智童子欢喜作礼，同时举手弹指称善。 是时，三十二天帝君即坐，各命飞天神人披紫阳玉台，开明真玉匮，出天中灵音自然玉书无量洞章，以属地官，度一切人，安尸镇灵，保魂录神。 其太黄皇曾天、太明玉完天、清明何童天、玄胎平育天、元明文举天、七耀摩夷天、虚无越衡天、太极蒙翳天，合八天。 天有八字，合六十四字，分属东方九气天君。 以青帝太玄女青符命，告下东方土府九署灵官，开度一切死魂，安镇尸形，营卫抚恤，无令地官驱迫摇动，一如女青文金龙驿行。 其赤明和阳天、玄明恭华天、耀明宗飘天、竺落皇笳天、虚明堂耀天、观明端静天、玄明恭庆天、太焕极瑶天，合八天。 天有八字，合六十四字，分属南方三气天君。 以赤帝太玄女青符命，告下南方土府九署灵官，开度南方一切死魂，安镇尸形，营卫抚恤，无令地官驱迫摇动，一如女青文金龙驿行。 其元载孔升天、太安皇崖天、显定极风天、始皇孝芒天、太黄翁重天、无思江由天、上揲阮乐天、无极昙誓天，合八天。

**The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture on Extinguishing Karma and Refining the Corpse to Restore Life**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture on Extinguishing Karma and Refining the Corpse to Restore Life*. Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. One of the ancient *Scriptures of Numinous Treasure*. Originally in one scroll, now rearranged into two. The base text of the upper scroll derives from the *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Unity* (Washing Mystery Section, Original Texts Category); collated with Dunhuang manuscript P.2865 (first half). The base text of the lower scroll is Dunhuang manuscript P.2865 (second half); collated with Dunhuang manuscript S.298.

---

**The Supreme Cavern Mystery Numinous Treasure Scripture on Extinguishing Karma and Refining the Corpse to Restore Life, Scroll One**

At that time, the Heavenly Worthy was in the Fragrant Grove Garden of the Ever-Joyful Abode, instructing seven thousand two hundred and forty youths. When the Dharma rites were roughly complete, the youths of superior wisdom and the Wheel-Turning Celestial Youths advanced, made obeisance, and addressed the Heavenly Worthy: "Today, as we attend your seat, our joy is beyond measure. The heavens have opened their grace, and all is radiant with light. The dark prisons of hell, the frozen realms of eternal night, the three paths and five sufferings of hungry ghosts and deceased spirits—all have been liberated and restored to blessedness. The Three Offices have ceased their accusations, and the living and the dead rejoice together.

Yet the souls of the departed, though freed, have not yet entered the Wheel of Rebirth. Their corporeal spirits scatter and fall, their rotting bones devoid of moisture, sinking into the ninefold earth, strewn across the subterranean bureaus. Their wandering souls drift in anguish, unable to return. The Earthly Offices press for reckoning, their bodily forms restless, enduring renewed sorrow and oppression, gazing upward to implore the heavens.

Now that grace has been extended and all is made anew, the August Dao flows freely, its blessings reaching the ten directions. We have heard that the Heavenly Worthy has bestowed great compassion; we pray that the August Mercy be universally applied. Grant that those who should be delivered be delivered, those who should be born be born, those who should be transformed be transformed, and those who should return be returned. If their karmic bonds are not yet severed and they cannot return, their bodily forms remain in their former abodes, concealed in the nine springs. Harassed by myriad spirits, they find no refuge, their wandering souls adrift, returning to afflict their descendants.

Since the Great Transformation has arisen, it is fitting that all be universally absolved. We do not know if there are further essential methods within the Dharma that may be proclaimed, to be announced to the Earthly Offices, so that they may pacify, console, and shelter them, allowing all to find peace. Let the nine bureaus be duly distinguished, and their bodies guarded and tended. If you deign to show compassion, then all under heaven will rejoice in harmony, the living and the dead bearing no resentment, and blessings will flow for a hundred million kalpas, endless through the ages."

Thereupon, the Heavenly Worthy universally commanded the Heavenly Thearchs, the Limitless Supreme Great Dao Lords, the Great Sage Assemblies of the Ten Directions, the Perfected Lords and Venerable Ones, the Flying Celestial Divine Kings, the Five Elder Thearchs, the Southern Supreme Life-Nurturing and World-Delivering Sima, the Recorders of Deeds and Lords of Destiny, the Perfected Ones of Longevity, the Jade Maidens of Mystic Harmony, the various Perfected Ones, and the innumerable hosts—all to resume their seats. "Now I shall further expound the Dharma gates for the youths of superior wisdom, clarifying the ancient canons of the Dragon Han and Mystic Capital, the *Jade Casket of the Nine Dark Realms* and the *Scripture of the Maiden of Azure Jade*, to deliver the dark prisons of hell, the frozen realms of eternal night, the three paths and five sufferings of hungry ghosts and deceased spirits, that all may behold the light.

Proclaim to the heavens, that each may elucidate the spontaneous jade scripts of their celestial names. Universally announce to the celestial and terrestrial water bureaus, the sun, moon, and stellar lodges, the Jade Armillary and Jade Balance, the Three Realms and Five Thearchs, the sacred mountains of the Five Peaks, the earthly officials of the nine lands, the Caverns of Primordial, Abyssal, Void, Numinous, and Non-Being, the Limitless and Boundless, the measureless heights and depths, the formless and colorless, the soundless and silent, the immeasurably vast and minute—all spirits and numina, each according to their appointed tasks.

Now, for those under your jurisdiction—those souls condemned for past transgressions—record their good and evil deeds, merits and faults, years, months, and days. Itemize each matter, distinguish their former abodes and the whereabouts of their bodily forms, and according to their respective domains, console and shelter them. Let the earthly deities guard and protect them, tend and provide for them, allowing no disturbance, so that they may achieve fruition according to their merits. Let those who should be transferred be transferred, those who should be delivered be delivered, those who should be transformed be transformed, and those who should be born be born. Let the records of the fallen be reviewed, the vows of the waters absolved, the celestial decrees of punishment erased, and all be made manifest."

Thereupon, the assembly of the fourfold host and the youths of superior wisdom rejoiced, made obeisance, and simultaneously raised their hands, snapping their fingers in praise.

At that moment, the Thirty-Two Heavenly Thearchs took their seats and commanded the Flying Celestial Divine Beings to unfurl the Purple Yang Jade Terrace, open the Luminous True Jade Casket, and retrieve the celestial, spontaneously arisen jade scriptures of the *Infinite Cavern Chapters* from the Heavenly Center. These were entrusted to the Earthly Offices to deliver all beings, pacify the corpse, guard the numen, and preserve the soul and spirit.

The Great Yellow August Heaven of Zeng, the Great Bright Jade Perfect Heaven, the Clear Bright How-Youth Heaven, the Mystic Womb Nurturing Heaven, the Primordial Bright Literary Flourishing Heaven, the Seven Luminaries Majestic Heaven, the Void Transcendent Balance Heaven, and the Supreme Ultimate Veiled Heaven—these eight heavens together possess eight characters, totaling sixty-four, which are assigned to the Nine Qi Heavenly Lords of the East. By the Azure Thearch’s *Great Mystery Maiden of Azure Jade Talisman*, they are proclaimed to the nine bureaus of the Eastern Earthly Offices, to deliver all deceased souls, pacify and guard their bodily forms, tend and console them, allowing no harassment or disturbance by the Earthly Offices, all in accordance with the *Maiden of Azure Jade Scripture* and the *Golden Dragon Courier’s Edicts*.

The Bright Crimson Harmonious Yang Heaven, the Mystic Bright Reverent Flourishing Heaven, the Radiant Bright Ancestral Whirling Heaven, the Bamboo Grove August Reed Heaven, the Void Bright Hall Radiance Heaven, the Contemplative Bright Upright Tranquility Heaven, the Mystic Bright Reverent Celebration Heaven, and the Supreme Resplendent Ultimate Jade Heaven—these eight heavens together possess eight characters, totaling sixty-four, which are assigned to the Three Qi Heavenly Lords of the South. By the Crimson Thearch’s *Great Mystery Maiden of Azure Jade Talisman*, they are proclaimed to the nine bureaus of the Southern Earthly Offices, to deliver all deceased souls of the South, pacify and guard their bodily forms, tend and console them, allowing no harassment or disturbance by the Earthly Offices, all in accordance with the *Maiden of Azure Jade Scripture* and the *Golden Dragon Courier’s Edicts*.

The Primordial Loaded Perforated Ascent Heaven, the Supreme Peace August Cliff Heaven, the Manifestly Fixed Ultimate Wind Heaven, the Beginning August Filial Awn Heaven, the Supreme Yellow Venerable Heavy Heaven, the No-Thought River Origin Heaven, the Upper Dice Joyous Heaven, and the Limitless Cloud Vow Heaven—these eight heavens...

chunks.original_text: 天有八字，合六十四字，分属西方七气天君。 以白帝太玄女青符命，告下西方土府九署灵官，开度西方一切死魂，安镇尸形，营卫抚恤，无令地官驱迫摇动，一如女青文金龙驿行。 其皓庭霄度天、渊通元洞天、翰宠妙成天、秀乐禁上天、无上常融天、玉隆腾胜天、龙变梵度天、平育贾奕天，合八天。 天有八字，合六十四字，分属北方五气天君。 以黑帝太玄女青符命，告下北方土府九署灵官，开度北方一切死魂，安镇尸形，营卫抚恤，无令地官驱迫摇动，一如女青文金龙驿行。 其上上上一气一气，上上上无极无顶无色，大罗之天自然玉文，总统中央黄元天君，以黄帝太玄女青符命，告下中央土府九署灵官，开度中央一切死魂，安镇尸形，营卫抚恤，无令地官驱迫摇动，一如女青文金龙驿传。 诸天各命飞天神王，以天中灵音自然玉书女青符命，并告五方五帝五岳土府灵官，即各依承符命，尊奉大法。 皇道既明，是时天朗气澄，三景停轮，星宿洞耀，璇玑不行，河海静默，山岳吞姻，时和气清，金风拂尘，天无浮翳，日月灌津，五苦解脱，长夜开魂，枯树生华，死骸还人，麟舞凤翔，飞鸣欣欣，诸天踊跃，散花称善。 天尊欣畅而作颂曰： 赤明回化，混尔而分。 阴阳炼变，其道自然。 玄图七转，至九仍还。 元命灵章，无量洞篇。 无常之品，气总九晨。 阳光潜启，明景乘烟。 三回五炼，和以七津。 随色蔚耀，各归本神。 大法简度，朽骸还人。 宝我妙道，位登上真。 回元五炼，至道上灵。 照耀日月，洞照九明。 诸天开宥，幽夜玄清。 朽骸超步，炼化自生。 嘘吸灵和，贯幽入冥。 神奇万变，飞魂反形。 乘烟驾空，上造皇庭。 玉书告命，土府太平。 一切受度，普入光明。 有宝我文，世世化生。 轻泄慢漏，风刀相刑。 玉章灵文生朱光，五灵结精焕十方。 四八分位合五行，列宿日月阴阳通。 植立天真保上皇，开化法门一切同。 弥罗大千道兴隆，金座欢乐难为常。 诸天踊跃奏灵章，开我妙道悟少童。 令尔亿劫生无穷，九转成真位仙王。 秘之中襟慎勿扬。 天尊颂毕，诸天上帝、无极太上大道君、十方无极至真大圣众、飞天神王一五老上帝君、南上好生度世司马、司录司命、长生上灵、玄和玉女、诸元君灵妃、诸真人、无鞅数众，七千二百四十童子，一时俱起，捻香散花，左回旋行三匝，还北向作礼，举手弹指。 三十二天日月星宿，一时俱明，地下九幽无极洞渊，光景玄彻，无复暗冥，幽隐普见。 地藏发泄，金玉露形，山川溪涧，一等缅平，白骨受气，朽尸还魂，九土清泰，地官安宁，众生普度，一切无偏。 大法流化，皇道开张，普告诸天日月星辰，璇玑玉衡、南斗北斗、司命司录、韩君主录、南昌上宫、诸地诸水、五岳灵山、三官九署、十二河源、长夜之府九幽之中四司五帝，一切神明，各遵承大法，普同一庆，以今为新，无上无下，无极无穷，无深无远，无幽无隐，无边无际，无大无小，无始无终，一切神灵，弹指告命，依承仰从。 灵宝青帝炼度五仙安灵镇神九气天文 东方九气青天承元始符命，告下东方无极世界土府神乡诸灵官，今有太上清信弟子某甲，灭度五仙，托尸太阴。 今於某界安宫立室，庇形后土，明承正法，安慰抚恤，青灵哺饴，九气朝华，精光充溢，炼饬形骸，骨芳肉香，亿劫不灰。

The heavens possess eight characters, combining into sixty-four, which are assigned to the Seven Qi Heavenly Lords of the West. By the White Thearch’s *Great Mystery Maiden of Azure Jade Talisman*, they are proclaimed to the nine bureaus of the Western Earthly Offices, to deliver all deceased souls of the West, pacify and guard their bodily forms, tend and console them, allowing no harassment or disturbance by the Earthly Offices, all in accordance with the *Maiden of Azure Jade Scripture* and the *Golden Dragon Courier’s Edicts*.

The Radiant Court Rosy Ascent Heaven, the Abyssal Permeation Primordial Grotto Heaven, the Soaring Honor Wondrous Completion Heaven, the Elegant Joy Forbidden Upper Heaven, the Peerless Constant Fusion Heaven, the Jade Exaltation Ascendant Victory Heaven, the Dragon Transformation Brahmanic Deliverance Heaven, and the Level Nurturing Splendid Brilliance Heaven—these eight heavens possess eight characters, combining into sixty-four, which are assigned to the Five Qi Heavenly Lords of the North. By the Black Thearch’s *Great Mystery Maiden of Azure Jade Talisman*, they are proclaimed to the nine bureaus of the Northern Earthly Offices, to deliver all deceased souls of the North, pacify and guard their bodily forms, tend and console them, allowing no harassment or disturbance by the Earthly Offices, all in accordance with the *Maiden of Azure Jade Scripture* and the *Golden Dragon Courier’s Edicts*.

The Supreme Supreme Supreme One Qi One Qi, the Supreme Supreme Supreme Limitless Peakless Colorless, the Heaven of the Great Net’s Natural Jade Script, governs the Central Yellow Primordial Heavenly Lord. By the Yellow Thearch’s *Great Mystery Maiden of Azure Jade Talisman*, they are proclaimed to the nine bureaus of the Central Earthly Offices, to deliver all deceased souls of the Center, pacify and guard their bodily forms, tend and console them, allowing no harassment or disturbance by the Earthly Offices, all in accordance with the *Maiden of Azure Jade Scripture* and the *Golden Dragon Courier’s Transmissions*.

Each heaven dispatches its Flying Heavenly Divine Kings, who, with the *Heavenly Center’s Numinous Sound Natural Jade Script Maiden of Azure Jade Talisman*, jointly proclaim to the Earthly Offices of the Five Directions, Five Thearchs, and Five Marchmounts. They each comply with the talismanic commands, reverently upholding the Great Dao.

The August Dao now made manifest, the heavens cleared and the qi settled; the Three Luminaries halted their wheels, the stellar lodges shone resplendently, the celestial pivots ceased their motion, rivers and seas stilled in silence, mountains and peaks swallowed their mists. The seasons harmonized, the qi purified, golden winds brushed away the dust, the heavens held no drifting veils, sun and moon bathed in radiance. The Five Sufferings dissolved, the long night’s souls awakened, withered trees blossomed anew, the dead regained their forms, unicorns danced and phoenixes soared, their joyful cries filling the air. The heavens leapt in exultation, scattering flowers and chanting praises.

The Heavenly Worthy, filled with delight, intoned this hymn:

The Crimson Clarity returns to transformation,
Merging with you yet dividing.
Yin and yang refine and change,
Their Dao naturally so.
The Mysterious Chart turns sevenfold,
To nine it still returns.
The Primordial Mandate’s numinous script,
Boundless are its cavernous chapters.
The ranks of the impermanent,
Their qi unites the Nine Mornings.
Yang’s light stealthily stirs,
Bright effulgences ride the mist.
Three revolutions, five refinements,
Harmonized with the Seven Streams.
Following their hues, they flourish and shine,
Each returning to their original spirits.
The Great Dao simplifies deliverance,
Withered bones regain their forms.
Treasure my wondrous Dao,
Ascend to the rank of Upper Perfected.
Return to the Five Refinements,
The supreme Dao’s highest numen.
Illuminating sun and moon,
Pervading the Nine Clarities.
The heavens open their grace,
The dark night’s mystery clears.
Withered bones transcend their steps,
Refined transformations arise of themselves.
Inhaling and exhaling the numinous harmony,
Piercing the dark to enter the hidden.
Spirits wondrously transform ten thousandfold,
Flying souls return to their forms.
Riding the mist and mounting the void,
They ascend to the August Court.
The Jade Script proclaims the mandate,
The Earthly Offices attain great peace.
All who receive deliverance
Universally enter the light.
Possessing my precious script,
Generation after generation, they transform and live.
Careless leaks and wanton disclosures
Will meet the wind’s blade in punishment.
The Jade Chapters’ numinous script births vermilion light,
The Five Numinous coalesce their essence, illuminating the ten directions.
The four eights divide their positions, uniting the Five Phases,
The stellar lodges, sun, moon, yin, and yang flow in communion.
Establishing the Heavenly Perfected to protect the Supreme August,
Opening the Dharma-gate to unify all.
The Great Thousand of the Maitreya Dao flourishes,
The golden throne’s joy cannot be constant.
The heavens leap in exultation, offering numinous hymns,
Opening my wondrous Dao to enlighten the young.
May you, through kalpas without end, live without limit,
Ninefold refined into Perfected, enthroned as Immortal Kings.
Guard this within your breast, take care not to divulge it.

The Heavenly Worthy finished his hymn. The Heavenly Thearchs, the Limitless Supreme Great Dao Lords, the Ten Directions’ Limitless Perfected Great Sages, the Flying Heavenly Divine Kings, the Five Venerable Thearch Lords, the Southern Supreme Life-Nurturing and World-Delivering Sima, the Recorders and Life-Mandate Officers, the Upper Numinous Immortals, the Mysterious Harmony Jade Maidens, the various Primordial Lords and Numinous Consorts, the Perfected Ones, and the innumerable hosts—seven thousand two hundred and forty youths—all rose as one. Pinching incense and scattering flowers, they circumambulated thrice to the left, then turned northward to bow, raising their hands and snapping their fingers.

The thirty-two heavens’ sun, moon, and stellar lodges all shone brightly at once. The Nine Dark Abysses of the netherworld’s limitless caverns were pervaded by luminous mystery, no longer shrouded in darkness, their hidden depths universally revealed. The Earth Treasury released its stores, gold and jade revealed their forms, mountains and rivers, streams and ravines, all leveled in vast evenness. White bones received qi, withered corpses regained their souls, the Nine Lands attained purity and peace, the Earthly Offices found tranquility, all beings received universal deliverance, none left unenlightened.

The Great Dao flowed and transformed, the August Way unfolded. Universally proclaimed to the heavens’ sun, moon, and stellar lodges, the celestial pivots and jade balances, the Southern and Northern Dippers, the Life-Mandate and Record Officers, Han Jun the Master Recorder, the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace, all earthly and aquatic realms, the Five Marchmounts’ numinous mountains, the Three Offices and Nine Bureaus, the Twelve River Sources, the Long Night’s Bureau within the Nine Darks, the Four Controllers and Five Thearchs—all numinous beings, each obeying the Great Dao, universally rejoiced as one, taking this day as new. Without above or below, without limit or end, without depth or distance, without darkness or concealment, without bounds or edges, without great or small, without beginning or end—all spirits, with a snap of their fingers, received the mandate and complied, reverently following.

The Numinous Treasure Azure Thearch Refines and Delivers the Five Immortals, Pacifies the Numinous and Mirrors the Divine Nine Qi Heavenly Script

The Nine Qi Azure Heaven of the East receives the Primordial Beginning’s talismanic command, proclaimed to the Earthly Offices and divine realms of the Eastern Limitless World. **The Yellow Chapter Rite of the Numinous Treasure’s Five Transmutations for Pacifying the Spirit and Securing the Divine**

The Cavernous Mystery Numinous Treasure’s Red Emperor, Perfected Master of the Utmost Truth, your servant Wang Jia, bows his head and respectfully addresses: Above, above, above—one qi, one qi; above, above, above—boundless, without summit, without color, without light, the vast and true Great Dao, the Primordial Heavenly Worthy of the Origin, the Thirty-Two Heavenly Emperors, and the Jade Sovereign of the Most High Great Dao.

Your servant, entrusted with the great transformation of the Primordial Origin, has witnessed the heavens open the dark prisons of the earthly hells, liberating the three paths, the five sufferings, and the hungry ghosts and dead souls from the Long Night, all bathed in radiant light. The imperial Dao having refined them, the decayed remains return to humanity; the Three Realms are purified, and the Earthly Bureau attains peace. Yet those who have perished, whose corpses are entrusted to the Great Yin and whose forms are lodged in the Earthly Palace—whose merit is slight and virtue meager, and who have not yet been granted return—shall all, in accordance with the talismanic commands of the Lady of Blue, be led by their respective overseers, consoled, sustained, and protected, so that none may be disturbed, and all may be restored to rebirth among humankind.

At that moment, the great sagely hosts of the heavens, the Boundless Most High Great Dao Sovereign, the Five Venerable Thearchs, the Flying Celestial Kings, the Southern Prosperity Upper Palace, the Longevity Marshal, the True Lord of Compassionate Life, the various Primordial Ladies and Numinous Consorts, the Jade Maidens of Mystic Harmony, the various Perfected Ones, and the seven thousand two hundred and forty divine youths simultaneously snapped their fingers, universally proclaiming to all heavens, earths, and waters; the sun, moon, and stellar lodges; the jade pivot and celestial balance; the Five Thearchs and Five Marchmounts; the various numinous mountains and earthly bureaus; the Three Offices and Nine Bureaus; the twelve river sources; the Cavernous Ultimate and Cavernous Abyss; all without height or depth, near or far, boundary or limit, great or small, end or extremity—every spirit was made to hear and know.

The golden tally and jade writ were entrusted to the Jade Maidens of Mystic Harmony, with the charge that henceforth all would be renewed, reverently upholding the great Dharma without partiality. Though the great cycles of heaven and earth have turned, the orthodox writ remains luminously clear. Now, in accordance with the ancient canon of the Upper Palace of the Lady of Blue, the sagely Dao is reaffirmed.

For the pure and faithful disciple, male or female, of such-and-such a prefecture, county, village, and hamlet, named Wang Jia, aged so-and-so years, whose natal destiny is bing-wu, whose register is held by the Red Emperor, who received qi in the seventh month, and who is endowed with yang from the Cinnabar Heaven—though his prior merit remains unfulfilled, and he dwells in this defiled world, tainted by its impurities—he is fated to perish, his life entrusted to the Great Yin, his form lodged in the Earthly Bureau. Now, in the central heaven, within such-and-such a village and hamlet, a chamber has been established in the Pacifying Palace as his dwelling. Yet his merit is slight and virtue meager, and he cannot return of his own accord. Now, driven and pressed by the Earthly Bureau, he finds no peace; his hun-soul flees, his po-soul scatters, and his corpse knows no rest.

Respectfully following the golden tally and jade writ of the Illuminated Perfection’s great Dharma, we now reverently invoke the natural jade writ talismanic commands of the Lady of Blue, petitioning them to descend and instruct the numinous officials of the nine earths within such-and-such a heaven to pacify and secure Wang Jia’s bodily form and earthly abode.

Those not yet reborn shall have their corporeal forms pacified and illuminated, sustained and protected, so that none may be disturbed.

In accordance with the writ of the Lady of Blue, offer azure-textured silk ninety feet, or nine feet, to the Nine Qi Heavenly Lords as a token of deliverance.

We further invoke the descent of the Three Qi Cinnabar Heaven’s Vermilion Numinous Life-Spirit Perfected Ones, accompanied by the immortals of the Southern Marchmount, riding three thousand myriad chariots of Vermilion Dragons, bearing the Three Qi celestial writ talismanic commands of the Red Emperor and Lady of Blue. chunks.original_text: 如女青文，以绛文之缯八十尺，或八尺，以奉三炁天君，为拔度之信。 又请下一炁黄天黄灵主魁神钮总生真人，从中岳仙人，乘黄龙万二千骑，赉一炁天文黄帝女青符命，下中央无极无穷无高无下无深无远无边无际土府一切诸灵官，开长夜之府九幽地狱，救出某甲魂神，还付故宅，应转者转，应#5度者度，应生者生，应还者还。 未得生者，明安尸形，抚恤营卫，不得摇动。 如女青文，以黄文之缯一百廿尺，或一十二尺，以奉一炁天君，为拔度之信。 又请下七炁素天白灵生神真人，从西岳仙人，乘白龙七千万骑，赉七炁天文白帝女青符命，下西乡九土诸灵官，开长夜之府九幽地狱，拔出某甲魂神，还付故宅，应转者转，应度者度，应生者生，应还者还，未得生者，明安尸形，抚恤营卫，不得摇动。 如女青文，以白文之缯七十尺，或七尺，以奉七炁天君，为拔度之信。 又请下五炁玄天玄灵生神真人，从北岳仙人，乘玄龙五千万骑，赉五炁天文黑帝女青符命，下北乡九土诸灵官，开长夜之府九幽地狱，拔出某甲魂神，还付故宅，应转者转，应度者度，应生者生，应还者还。 未得生者，明安尸形，抚恤营卫，不得摇动。 如女青文，以玄文之缯五十尺，或五尺，以奉五炁天君，为拔度之信。 又以上金五两，或铁五十斤，以奉五帝，安镇五方。 甲今应在开度之例，九土地官，各依部界，经营侍卫，供给有无，令形安神守，魄不砀散。 须待功成，当反旧宅，受津而生。 愿五帝哺饴太和元精，导炁养神，饮以三光，玄注洪源，玉芝自充，光华早莹，澧液早香，魂游上清，衣食自然，下附宫宅，与景合并，不相远离，同受化生。 今日大庆，度人无量，土府一切，莫不咸从，尊承旧法，列功诸天。 有违女青，削官罚形，明如旧制，金龙驿行。 谨以表闻，伏须告报。 臣甲诚惶诚恐，死罪死罪，稽首再拜以闻。 臣姓某，属郡县乡里。 上上上一炁一炁，上上上无极无顶，无色无光，辽廓至真大道元始天尊、卅二帝、太上大道君泰清玉陛下#6。 太岁某子某月某子朔某日某子某时，於某天郡县乡里中，黄素#7章表一通，金龙上呈。 女青旧典，以朱笔书此文於黄缯上，师於亡人所在，子时北向，烧五香火，施安五镇而奏上黄缯章。 露文一宿，明日平旦，各埋文方面，以镇神安形。 行之者，女青文曰九祖幽魂皆即出长夜，身入光明，三官削对，天堂记名，供其厨饭，卅二年皆还其故形而更生也。 未得还者，形骸故宅则为五帝侍卫，地祇营护，安慰抚恤，无有摇动，不出百年，无不化生而得还於人道也。 三界簿录，甚有分明，智者洞其至理，考其善恶，缘对报应，明不虚言。 愚者任命，谓之不然，三官徒炭，甚可哀哉。 天真皇人曰：昔赤明天中有道士姓郑，字仁安，功德未满，死於长山北戎之阿。 其子仲明，师玄和先生，以此文镇仁安尸形宫宅卅年，仁安被度，应还人中，而为獦人所烧，形骸郁然而起，今为上宫南帝老君。 得道之迹，今题太极上宫南轩，甚有分明也。 天真皇人曰：昔善忍国有道士姓现，字信然，师无常童子，受灵宝灭度升天之传，功德未足，死於青元天中，埋尸於流生之州。 无常童子以此文镇其尸形，百年而遇洪水所荡，於此化生，今受号为元灵老君。

As in the *Scripture of Lady Blue*,
with crimson-scripted silk eighty feet in length—or eight feet—offered to the Lords of the Three Qi,
as a token of deliverance.
Again, invoke the descent of the Yellow Numinous Life-Spirit Perfected Sovereign of the One Qi, Yellow Heaven,
accompanied by the immortals of the Central Marchmount,
riding twelve thousand chariots of Yellow Dragons,
bearing the One Qi celestial writ talismanic commands of the Yellow Emperor and Lady Blue.
They descend to the limitless, boundless, measureless, depthless, fathomless, endless Earthly Bureau of the Central Realm and all its numinous officials,
opening the Long Night’s abode and the Nine Nether Hells,
to rescue Wang Jia’s hun-soul and spirit,
returning them to his former abode.
Those who should be transformed shall be transformed;
those who should be delivered shall be delivered;
those who should be reborn shall be reborn;
those who should return shall return.
Those not yet reborn shall have their corporeal forms pacified and illuminated,
sustained and protected,
so that none may be disturbed.

As in the *Scripture of Lady Blue*,
with yellow-scripted silk one hundred twenty feet in length—or twelve feet—offered to the Lord of the One Qi,
as a token of deliverance.
Again, invoke the descent of the White Numinous Life-Spirit Perfected Ones of the Seven Qi, White Heaven,
accompanied by the immortals of the Western Marchmount,
riding seventy million chariots of White Dragons,
bearing the Seven Qi celestial writ talismanic commands of the White Emperor and Lady Blue.
They descend to the numinous officials of the nine earths of the western region,
opening the Long Night’s abode and the Nine Nether Hells,
to extricate Wang Jia’s hun-soul and spirit,
returning them to his former abode.
Those who should be transformed shall be transformed;
those who should be delivered shall be delivered;
those who should be reborn shall be reborn;
those who should return shall return.
Those not yet reborn shall have their corporeal forms pacified and illuminated,
sustained and protected,
so that none may be disturbed.

As in the *Scripture of Lady Blue*,
with black-scripted silk fifty feet in length—or five feet—offered to the Lords of the Five Qi,
as a token of deliverance.
Again, invoke the descent of the Dark Numinous Life-Spirit Perfected Ones of the Five Qi, Dark Heaven,
accompanied by the immortals of the Northern Marchmount,
riding fifty million chariots of Dark Dragons,
bearing the Five Qi celestial writ talismanic commands of the Black Emperor and Lady Blue.
They descend to the numinous officials of the nine earths of the northern region,
opening the Long Night’s abode and the Nine Nether Hells,
to extricate Wang Jia’s hun-soul and spirit,
returning them to his former abode.
Those who should be transformed shall be transformed;
those who should be delivered shall be delivered;
those who should be reborn shall be reborn;
those who should return shall return.
Those not yet reborn shall have their corporeal forms pacified and illuminated,
sustained and protected,
so that none may be disturbed.

Further, with five taels of gold—or fifty catties of iron—offered to the Five Emperors,
to pacify and secure the Five Directions.
Wang Jia now falls within the precedent of deliverance:
the earthly officials of the nine lands shall each attend to their jurisdictions,
providing sustenance and protection,
ensuring the stability of his form and the guardianship of his spirit,
so that his po-soul shall not scatter.
They shall await the completion of the ritual,
when he shall return to his former abode,
cross the ford and be reborn.
May the Five Emperors nourish him with the sweetness of Grand Harmony’s primordial essence,
guide his qi and nurture his spirit,
imbue him with the Three Luminaries,
infuse him with the dark flow of the vast source,
so that jade mushrooms spontaneously flourish within him,
his radiance soon gleams,
his sweet dew soon fragrances,
his hun-soul ascends to the Upper Clarity,
his clothing and sustenance arise naturally,
and he descends to dwell in his palace,
united with the light,
never again parted from it,
together receiving transformation and rebirth.

Today is a day of great celebration,
when the deliverance of beings is measureless.
All within the Earthly Bureau shall comply,
reverently upholding the ancient statutes,
and inscribing their merit across the heavens.
Those who defy the *Scripture of Lady Blue*
shall have their offices abolished and their forms punished,
as clearly stipulated in the old regulations,
with golden dragons hastening the decree.

Respectfully submitted for your consideration,
awaiting your response.
Your servant, Wang Jia, prostrates himself in awe and dread,
bowing twice in reverence to report.
Your servant, [Name], of [Prefecture], [County], [Township], [Village].

Supreme, supreme, supreme—One Qi, One Qi!
Supreme, supreme, supreme—boundless, without summit,
without color, without light,
vast and transcendent, the Perfected of the Great Dao,
the Primordial Celestial Worthy,
the Thirty-Two Emperors,
the Most High Lord of the Great Dao,
His August Jade Majesty of the Grand Clarity.

In the year [X] of the Great Era, the [X] month, the first day of the [X] month, at the [X] hour,
at [Prefecture], [County], [Township], [Village],
a memorial on yellow silk,
presented via golden dragon.

According to the ancient canons of *Lady Blue*,
this text is inscribed in vermilion on yellow silk.
The master, at the place where the deceased lies,
at the hour of the rat, facing north,
burns five incense fires,
performs the Five Pacifications,
and presents the yellow silk memorial.
The text is exposed to the open air for one night;
at dawn the following day,
it is buried in the corresponding direction,
to pacify the spirits and stabilize the form.

For those who perform this rite,
the *Scripture of Lady Blue* states:
the nine generations of ancestral souls in the Long Night
shall all emerge into the light,
their names recorded in the Heavenly Register,
their offenses expunged by the Three Officials,
and after thirty-two years,
they shall regain their former forms and be reborn.
For those not yet reborn,
their remains in the former abode shall be guarded by the Five Emperors,
protected by the earthly deities,
comforted and sustained,
so that none may be disturbed.
Within a hundred years,
none shall fail to be transformed and restored to the human realm.

The ledgers of the Three Realms are most precise:
the wise discern their profound principles,
examining good and evil,
karma and retribution,
knowing these words are not empty.
The foolish submit to fate,
denying their truth—
how pitiable their suffering in the Three Officials’ burning charcoal!

The Perfected of the Celestial Truth said:
In the era of Red Clarity,
there was a Daoist named Zheng Ren’an,
whose merit was incomplete when he died in the northern wastes of Mount Chang.
His son, Zhongming,
studied under Master Xuanhe
and used this text to pacify Ren’an’s remains in his palace for thirty years.
Ren’an was delivered and destined to return to the human realm,
but his body was burned by barbarians.
His form arose in dark majesty,
and he now serves as the Elder Lord of the Southern Palace.
The traces of his attainment are inscribed in the Southern Pavilion of the Supreme Ultimate,
most clearly recorded.

The Perfected of the Celestial Truth said:
In the kingdom of Shànrěn,
there was a Daoist named Xian Xinran,
who studied under the Eternal Youth
and received the transmission of the *Lingbao Scripture of Extinction and Ascension*.
His merit incomplete,
he died in the Heaven of Azure Origin,
his remains interred in the Land of Flowing Life.
The Eternal Youth used this text to pacify his form,
and after a hundred years,
when a great flood swept it away,
he was transformed and reborn.
He now bears the title of Elder Lord of Primordial Numinosity.

chunks.original_text: 南宫书其道迹，在紫微之馆。 天真皇人曰：昔弃贤世界有道士姓浩，字敷明，少好山水，弃家远学，功德未满，死於地镜山下，其子少信，就北郭先生受此文，镇敷明形尸，七百年被水火练度，而得还生人中。 后师黑文子，受升天之传，今为玄老之帝。 南宫今书其道迹，在北元玄窗。 天真皇人曰：中元天中南浮梨世界，有道士姓王，字度明，少出游学，从屠真公受五篇文升仙之传，功德未足，死於东山广灵之阿。 其子景秀，诣戴仲君受此文，以镇尸形九十年，遭东山大荒，人民掘土觅食，发其死尸，而即化生，后道成升天，为景霄真人。 天真皇人曰：此诸君皆积学灭度，道业垂成，而得受此文，以还生人中，皆超虚步空，上升金阙，受号自然也。 其并悠远，世人所不能明。 考其近者，衍门子师夜光，高丘子师石公，洪崖先生师金母，并受灵宝灭度五练之法，升天之传。 衍门子死於渔阳洛县#8长丘山，高丘子死於中山闻喜县高附山，洪崖先生死於武威姑臧县浪山中，并受此文以镇其墓。 衍门子册年墓崩而形化，后入蒙山大洞黄金之庭，受书为仙卿。 高丘子七十二年墓崩#9，为人所发，捬棺而形飞，今为中岳真人。 洪崖先生百廿年墓开，尸形飞腾，受书为青城真人。 此之诸贤，并受灭度之法，升天之传，镇灵之道，而得崇虚陵清，策空高霞，游晏紫微，受号真人也。 此之近事，非复悠远之传。 元始#10天王今披元始之宝藏，以告太极上仙，遇之者将前生万劫，录名上清，应得仙道者也。 诸天男女可不承女青之旨，秘而宝之焉。 太上灵宝洞玄灭度五炼生尸妙经卷下#11 #1 教煌P.2865号抄本，卷首残缺，卷尾完好，存经文二七四行。 其前一三四行与《道藏》本《五炼生尸经》相当（有缺文）。 第一三五行以下不见於《道藏》本，据考为《五炼生尸经》佚文，今据此抄本校补为经文下卷。 又敦煌S.298抄本，卷首残，卷尾完好，文字与P.2865号抄本第一五四行以下相当。 今用作参校本。 #2 此系P.2865抄本第一三五行小标题。

In the Southern Palace, his Daoist traces are recorded in the Purple Tenuity’s Hall.

The Perfected of the Celestial Truth said:
In the world of Abandoned Worthiness, there was a Daoist surnamed Hào, styled Fūmíng. From youth, he loved mountains and rivers, abandoned his home to study afar, but his merit unfulfilled, he died beneath the Earth-Mirror Mountain. His son, Shàoxìn, sought the Northern Outer Master and received this text to pacify the form of Fūmíng’s corpse. After seven hundred years of refinement by water and fire, he was restored to life among men. Later, he studied under Master Black Text and received the transmission of ascension to heaven. He now serves as the Elder Lord of the Mysterious.

In the Southern Palace, his Daoist traces are recorded in the Northern Origin’s Mysterious Window.

The Perfected of the Celestial Truth said:
In the Southern Pear World of the Middle Origin Heaven, there was a Daoist surnamed Wáng, styled Dùmíng. From youth, he traveled to study and received from Master Tú the True the transmission of the *Five Chapters on Ascending as an Immortal*. His merit incomplete, he died in the eastern mountains’ broad and numinous vale. His son, Jǐngxiù, sought Master Dài Zhòngjūn and received this text to pacify his corpse. After ninety years, when the eastern mountains suffered great famine and people dug the earth for food, they unearthed his corpse, and he was immediately transformed and reborn. Later, his Dao perfected, he ascended to heaven and became the Perfected of the Scenic Empyrean.

The Perfected of the Celestial Truth said:
All these gentlemen accumulated learning and neared extinction, their Daoist work nearly complete, when they received this text and were restored to life among men. All transcended the void, stepped through the emptiness, ascended to the Golden Gates, and received titles by nature.

Their deeds stretch far into the distant past, beyond the understanding of common men. Examining those closer to our time: Master Yǎnmén studied under Night Radiance, Master Gāoqiū studied under Master Stone, and Master Hóngyá studied under the Metal Mother. All received the *Lingbao Scripture of Extinction and the Five Refinements* and the transmission of ascension to heaven.

Master Yǎnmén died in Chángqiū Mountain of Lù County in Yúyáng. Master Gāoqiū died in Gāofù Mountain of Wénxǐ County in Zhōngshān. Master Hóngyá died in Làng Mountain of Gūzāng County in Wǔwēi. All received this text to pacify their tombs.

After several decades, Master Yǎnmén’s tomb collapsed, and his form transformed. Later, he entered the Golden Court of the Great Cavern of Mount Méng and received the scriptures, becoming a Minister of Immortals. After seventy-two years, Master Gāoqiū’s tomb collapsed and was opened by men. His coffin was raised, and his form took flight. He now serves as the Perfected of the Central Marchmount. After one hundred twenty years, Master Hóngyá’s tomb opened, and his corpse’s form soared aloft. He received the scriptures and became the Perfected of Green City.

All these worthies received the method of extinction, the transmission of ascension, and the Dao of pacifying the numinous. Thus, they ascended the lofty void, soared through the high clouds, roamed in leisure through the Purple Tenuity, and received the title of Perfected.

These recent events are no longer distant transmissions. The Heavenly King of the Primordial Beginning now reveals the treasure store of the Primordial Beginning to the Supreme Ultimate’s Transcendents. Those who encounter it will transcend ten thousand kalpas of past lives, their names recorded in the Upper Clarity, and they shall attain the Dao of immortality.

O men and women of the heavens, how can you fail to heed the decree of the *Nüqīng*? Treasure and guard it in secret.

*Wondrous Scripture of the Five Refinements for Extinction and the Revivification of the Corpse from the Cavernous Mystery of the Numinous Treasure*, Scroll the Lower.
